document.full_text: iranian opposition leader mehdi karoubi has been allowed out of house arrest to look for a new home where he will be put under house arrest again, a conservative website said on saturday.
document.title: iran lets karoubi hunt new house for house arrest
lines_and_colors: iranian opposition leader mehdi karoubi has been allowed out of house arrest to look for a new home where he will be put under house arrest again, a conservative website said on saturday.
